ModMetaData.name: [WSK] Prisoner Caravan Fix
ModMetaData.author: whitespacekilla
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Summary[/h1]
The February 15th Rimworld update (v1.4.3641) broke prisoner capture for caravans. An extremely small change fixes it so you can use this mod until then. Relies on Harmony to apply a transpiler to the broken Pawn.ExitMap method. Source code included if you are interested.
Tested with no mods besides Harmony and a few hundred mods. Worked in both instances.
I will take this mod down once Ludeon releases an update.
